text:
Hi, 
Has a fix been issued for this? Today was my first encounter with a customer
having the problem. I removed the unneeded HP Smart App (he has no HP printers
but used to). “Printers and Devices” in Control Panel still shows HP M101-106
 IDs for all the printers. This user had functional issues too where jobs were
going to the wrong queue. Has a fix been issued that puts things back to
normal? 
Thanks, 
Ira Shapiro
%2452ecd2b0%24f8c67810%24%40verizon.net

Hi, 
Has a fix been issued for this?  Today was my first encounter with a customer
having the problem.  I removed the unneeded HP Smart App (he has no HP printers
but used to).  “Printers and Devices” in Control Panel still shows HP M101-106
 IDs for all the printers.  This user had functional issues too where jobs were
going to the wrong queue.  Has a fix been issued that puts things back to
normal? 
Thanks, 
Ira Shapiro
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/041a01da346e%2452ecd2b0%24f8c67810%24%40verizon.net
